biotools.summary: webPIPSA is the web server for Protein Interaction Property Similarity Analysis (PIPSA), a procedure for the comparison and analysis of protein electrostatic potentials for a large number of related protein structures. The resulting matrices of pairwise electrostatic similarities may be visualized as epograms or heat maps.
